name: ProtoFighter (Grailas)
description:
[Insert a story about the nation being under attack, and you piloting a new, prototype spacecraft to turn the tide]

WASD/Arrow keys to move, Spacebar to shoot.

The sliders were intended for adjusting your ships power on-the-go with the mouse, but are non-functional.

Also, while the correct effects do display, you cannot die.
